title: load_state_dict with auto_matching
body_html:
It's very common to load pre-trained state_dict with a modified network structure.
Add an auto_match argument, default False, acting exactly the same without modification of old codes.
And when set to True, auto matching will be performed, will only load parameters with exactly the same names and sizes.
body_text:
It's very common to load pre-trained state_dict with a modified network structure.

And when set to True, auto matching will be performed, will only load parameters with exactly the same names and sizes.
body:
It's very common to load pre-trained state_dict with a modified network structure. 
Add an auto_match argument, default False, acting exactly the same without modification of old codes. 
And when set to True, auto matching will be performed, will only load parameters with exactly the same names and sizes.
